body_content.explanation: an arrangement you make to have a hotel room, tickets, etc. at a particular time in the future, or the process of making this arrangement:
examples: We made the booking three months ago.
Brad was away so we had to cancel the booking.
The festival is always popular, so early booking is strongly recommended.
I filled in the booking form and sent it off.

body_content.explanation: a punishment for breaking the rules in a football game in which the referee writes the player's name in a book:
examples: When a defender gets a booking, he has to be careful not to get another and be sent off.
